comment: Set the nematic mean field potential to a value much higher than the isotropic-nematic transition value of 4.1 (critical value of 4.2 in 3D)
This species array corresponds to default so is extreneous

species.comment: Initialize the director in random directions
dens is an alternative to pop for setting the average cell density

comment: domainWalls=1 sets PBCs around the domain, which is the default so this is also extreneous
